Episodes.Title: Let You Down
Episodes.Writer: Mike Pondsmith, Bartosz Sztybor, Masahiko Ôtsuka
Episodes.Actors: Zach Aguilar, Gloria Garayua, Borge Etienne
Episodes.Plot: After a night of streaming illegal braindance, David wakes up to reality: a rundown apartment with a broken washing machine and an overworked mother.

Episodes.Title: Like A Boy
Episodes.Writer: Jan Bartkowicz, Rafal Jaki, Lukasz Ludkowski
Episodes.Actors: Zach Aguilar, Emi Lo, William Christopher Stephens
Episodes.Plot: With his newly enhanced body, David heads to the Academy seeking revenge on his bully. Later, he meets a mysterious woman who wants to recruit him.

Episodes.Title: Smooth Criminal
Episodes.Writer: Jan Bartkowicz, Rafal Jaki, Lukasz Ludkowski
Episodes.Actors: Zach Aguilar, Emi Lo, William Christopher Stephens
Episodes.Plot: Surrounded by a group of rowdy edgerunners, David makes a plea to join their team. Meanwhile, sinister forces plot to lure him back to Arasaka Academy.

Episodes.Title: Lucky You
Episodes.Writer: Rafal Jaki, Kayli Mills, Mike Pondsmith
Episodes.Actors: Zach Aguilar, Emi Lo, William Christopher Stephens
Episodes.Plot: Eager to learn the edgerunner ropes, David pesters Maine for another mission. Instead, Maine tasks Lucy with training him.

Episodes.Title: All Eyez On Me
Episodes.Writer: Rafal Jaki, Mike Pondsmith, Gregory Snegoff
Episodes.Actors: Zach Aguilar, Emi Lo, William Christopher Stephens
Episodes.Plot: David makes a clever suggestion when the team strategizes for their next mission. However, he soon learns that their target can't be underestimated.

Episodes.Title: Girl on Fire
Episodes.Writer: Jan Bartkowicz, Rafal Jaki, Lukasz Ludkowski
Episodes.Actors: Zach Aguilar, Emi Lo, William Christopher Stephens
Episodes.Plot: Maine doesn't seem to be himself. But the team has bigger fish to fry: They must race against time to extract vital information from their prisoner.

Episodes.Title: Stronger
Episodes.Writer: Jan Bartkowicz, Rafal Jaki, Lukasz Ludkowski
Episodes.Actors: Zach Aguilar, Emi Lo, Alex Cazares
Episodes.Plot: Now an all-star edgerunner enhanced with more cybernetics, David leads his team into a new mission. An old contact reaches out to him for a big job.

Episodes.Title: Stay
Episodes.Writer: Jan Bartkowicz, Rafal Jaki, Lukasz Ludkowski
Episodes.Actors: Zach Aguilar, Emi Lo, Alex Cazares
Episodes.Plot: Faraday finds himself stuck between Arasaka and Militech. Lucy and Rebecca confront David about his change in behavior, but he refuses to listen.

Episodes.Title: Humanity
Episodes.Writer: Jan Bartkowicz, Rafal Jaki, Lukasz Ludkowski
Episodes.Actors: Zach Aguilar, Emi Lo, Alex Cazares
Episodes.Plot: Lucy's captors learn about her secret mission and dark past. David and his team head out to complete Faraday's job but realize that something is off.

Episodes.Title: My Moon My Man
Episodes.Writer: Jan Bartkowicz, Rafal Jaki, Lukasz Ludkowski
Episodes.Actors: Zach Aguilar, Emi Lo, Alex Cazares
Episodes.Plot: On the edge of cyberpsychosis but determined to save Lucy, David storms into Night City as Arasaka plots to deploy their ultimate lethal weapon.
